title: The Peter Schiff Show - 2012 Mar 05 MO [sebaygo1]
description:
.
							
The Peter Schiff Show
Monday, 02 March 2012


[sebaygo1]


Tom Woods is guest hosting today's show.

Today's first guest is Robert Murphy, adjunct scholar at the Mises Institute and author of Lessons for the Young Economist, on the overzealous prosecution of insider trading and how central bankers are overriding national sovereignty.

Today's second guest is Michael Boldin, founder and executive director of the Tenth Amendment Center, on how nullification is being used to beat back the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) and how the left can be recruited for 10th Amendment activism.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
